title: The Ferocious Taoist Couple Was Also Reborn! - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Cultivation   Early Romance   Engagement   Evil Organizations   Fantasy World   Fast Cultivation   God Protagonist   Godly Powers   Hiding True Abilities   Hiding True Identity   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Power Couple   Previous Life Talent   Second Chance   Strong Love Interests   Time Travel   Unique Cultivation Technique   Unreliable Narrator   Younger Sisters
author: 雨下的好大
description:
As the only male in the Lu family, Lu Shui received an order from the elders of the clan today: go to the Mu family to divorce. I heard that Mu Jiatian’s beautiful girl lost her cultivation overnight and turned into a waste, which caused the Lu family’s elders to be very dissatisfied. The ordinary land and water did not refuse. When Lu Shui came to Mu's house and saw his fiancee, he was stunned. It turned out that this fierce and discordant wife in the previous life was also reborn.
>
